description: The luxury cruise ship where young Sanji worked as a cook before it was attacked by Zeff's Cook Pirates. This is where Sanji first met Zeff and declared his dream of finding the All Blue.

keyEvents.title: Cook Pirates Attack Sanji's Ship
keyEvents.description: Zeff's Cook Pirates attack the cruise ship where young Sanji works, beginning the events that will change both their lives.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Sanji and Zeff first meet under hostile circumstances.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Declares Dream of All Blue
keyEvents.description: During the pirate attack, young Sanji declares his dream of finding the legendary All Blue to Zeff.
keyEvents.significance: First revelation of Sanji's core dream and motivation.

keyEvents.title: Storm Destroys Ships
keyEvents.description: A massive storm hits both ships, causing Sanji to be swept overboard and forcing Zeff to rescue him.
keyEvents.significance: The event that leads to Zeff's sacrifice and their bond.

statusHistory.reason: Destroyed in the storm that swept Sanji overboard

description: A small, desolate rocky island with no vegetation or animals where Zeff and young Sanji were stranded for 47 days after the storm. The harsh conditions of this barren island tested their will to survive.

keyEvents.title: Stranded on Rocky Island
keyEvents.description: Zeff and Sanji wash up on a barren rocky island after the storm. They divide their meager supplies and go to opposite ends to watch for rescue ships.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for Zeff's ultimate sacrifice and the formation of their bond.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Discovers Zeff's Sacrifice
keyEvents.description: After his food runs out, Sanji discovers that Zeff had given him all the food while keeping only treasure for himself.
keyEvents.significance: The moment that reveals Zeff's selfless sacrifice and establishes Sanji's profound debt to him.

keyEvents.title: Zeff Reveals Shared Dream
keyEvents.description: Zeff tells Sanji that he also dreams of finding the All Blue, explaining why he saved Sanji's life.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the spiritual bond between Zeff and Sanji based on their shared impossible dream.

keyEvents.title: Rescue from Rocky Island
keyEvents.description: After 47 days stranded, Sanji and Zeff are finally rescued by a passing ship.
keyEvents.significance: End of their ordeal and beginning of their new life together.

statusHistory.reason: Island remains as a testament to their survival

description: The floating restaurant on the sea, founded by Zeff and Sanji after being rescued from the rocky island.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Pearl Battle on Baratie Deck
keyEvents.description: Pearl battles Sanji on the deck while Gin holds Zeff hostage, preventing Sanji from fighting effectively.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle taking place at the Baratie with Sanji unable to protect it properly.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Destroys Port-Side Fin
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Ono to completely destroy the Baratie's port-side fin in his rage at the Krieg Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Significant damage to the restaurant that Zeff and Sanji built together.

statusHistory.reason: Port-side fin destroyed by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Ono attack
